title: What a shot! 29 amazing sports photos
text:
Photos: What a shot! 29 amazing sports photos Seattle Mariners outfielder Ichiro Suzuki acknowledges fans while exiting the field during the eighth inning of a game against the Oakland Athletics at Tokyo Dome on March 21. On Thursday, the veteran outfielder announced his retirement after playing 19 seasons in the MLB. Hide Caption 1 of 29

Photos: What a shot! 29 amazing sports photos Duke forward RJ Barrett dunks as teammate Zion Williamson celebrates during a game against the North Dakota State Bison in the first round of the 2019 NCAA Men's Basketball Tournament at Colonial Life Arena on Friday, March 22. Hide Caption 2 of 29

Photos: What a shot! 29 amazing sports photos Simone Biles of the United States performs on the uneven bars during the all-around competition at the International Gymnastics Federation World Cup in Stuttgart, Germany on March 17. Hide Caption 3 of 29

Photos: What a shot! 29 amazing sports photos Reed Tomey, 6, center right, pushes away the arm of his brother, Rhett, 8, as the two attempt to get autographs from Chicago Cubs players before a spring training game against the Seattle Mariners in Mesa, Arizona, on Tuesday, March 19. Hide Caption 4 of 29

Photos: What a shot! 29 amazing sports photos Nicholas Piccininni of Oklahoma State wrestles Korbin Meink of Campbell during the Division I Men's Wrestling Championship held at PPG Paints Arena in Pittsburgh on Thursday, March 21. Hide Caption 5 of 29

Photos: What a shot! 29 amazing sports photos Leah Griesser of Germany performs on the uneven bars during the 2019 Gymnastics World Cup at Resorts World Arena in Birmingham, England on Saturday, March 23. Hide Caption 6 of 29

Photos: What a shot! 29 amazing sports photos Brewers infielder Tyler Saladino plays in the dugout with Christopher Perez, son of his teammate Hernán Pérez, before a spring training baseball game against the Texas Rangers on Tuesday, March 19 in Phoenix, Arizona. Hide Caption 7 of 29

Photos: What a shot! 29 amazing sports photos LSU Tigers forward Emmitt Williams celebrates with his teammates after defeating the Maryland Terrapins in the second round of the NCAA Men's Basketball Tournament on Saturday, March 23, in Jacksonville, Florida. LSU sophomore Tremont Waters hit a game-winning shot in the final seconds of the game to advance the Tigers to the Sweet 16. Hide Caption 8 of 29

Photos: What a shot! 29 amazing sports photos New York Rangers goaltender Henrik Lundqvist gets sprayed with ice in front of the net during the first period of a game against the Detroit Red Wings at Madison Square Garden on Tuesday, March 19. Hide Caption 9 of 29

Photos: What a shot! 29 amazing sports photos Caroline Wozniacki returns a ball between her legs during a match with Monica Niculescu on Day 6 of the Miami Open at Hard Rock Stadium on Saturday, March 23. Hide Caption 10 of 29

Photos: What a shot! 29 amazing sports photos Atlanta Hawks guard Trae Young is doused with water by teammates DeAndre' Bembry and Justin Anderson, right, after making a game-winning basket in the final moments of an NBA game against the Philadelphia 76ers on Saturday, March 23 in Atlanta. Hide Caption 11 of 29

Photos: What a shot! 29 amazing sports photos A gymnast competes on the rings during the Stuttgart World Cup gymnastics competition in Stuttgart, Germany on Sunday, March 17. Hide Caption 12 of 29

Photos: What a shot! 29 amazing sports photos Ireland player Nichola Fryday, second from right, and the rest of the Irish rugby team prepares for a scrum during a Women's Six Nations rugby match between Wales and Ireland on Sunday, March 17 in Cardiff, Wales. Hide Caption 13 of 29

Photos: What a shot! 29 amazing sports photos A cyclist competes during the Team Elimination on day three of the Phynova Six Day Manchester cycling event in Manchester, England on Sunday, March 24. Hide Caption 14 of 29

Photos: What a shot! 29 amazing sports photos Purdue guard Carsen Edwards, left, and Villanova's Phil Booth dive for a loose ball during their second round game of the 2019 NCAA Men's Basketball Tournament in Hartford, Connecticut on Saturday, March 23. Purdue defeated Villanova to advance to the Sweet 16. Hide Caption 15 of 29

Photos: What a shot! 29 amazing sports photos Kyle Busch practices for the Monster Energy NASCAR Cup series STP 500 at Martinsville Speedway on Saturday, March 23. Hide Caption 16 of 29

Photos: What a shot! 29 amazing sports photos Naomi Osaka hits a forehand during a match against Yanina Wickmayer in the second round of the Miami Open on Friday, March 22. Osaka defeated Wickmayer in three sets. Hide Caption 17 of 29

Photos: What a shot! 29 amazing sports photos Amaya Scott of Bethune-Cookman reaches for a rebound during a first-round game against Notre Dame in the NCAA Women's College Basketball Tournament in South Bend, Indiana on Saturday, March 23. Hide Caption 18 of 29

Photos: What a shot! 29 amazing sports photos Los Angeles Dodgers third baseman Justin Turner falls into the stands while chasing a foul ball during the third inning of a spring training baseball game against the Milwaukee Brewers in Glendale, Arizona on Sunday, March 17. Hide Caption 19 of 29

Photos: What a shot! 29 amazing sports photos Cayden Harmon of Lipan, Texas, competes in steer wrestling during the American Junior Rodeo Association Youth Rodeo in Midland, Texas on Saturday, March 23. Hide Caption 20 of 29

Photos: What a shot! 29 amazing sports photos VfL Wolfsburg players Alexandra Popp, left, and Lena Goessling, center, compete for a loose ball with Ada Hegerberg of the Olympique Lyonnais during a UEFA women's Champions League quarter-final soccer match in Decines-Charpieu, France on Wednesday, March 20. Hide Caption 21 of 29

Photos: What a shot! 29 amazing sports photos Runners jog up Sunset Boulevard during the 34th annual Los Angeles Marathon on Sunday, March 24. Hide Caption 22 of 29

Photos: What a shot! 29 amazing sports photos Oklahoma State wrestler Daton Fix (orange) wrestles Nick Suriano of Rutguers (white) in the finals of the 133 pound weight class during the NCAA Wrestling Championships at PPG Paints Arena in Pittsburgh on Saturday, March 23. Hide Caption 23 of 29

Photos: What a shot! 29 amazing sports photos Sophie Lacourse-Pudifin of Canada competes in rhythmic gymnastics during the Special Olympics World Games in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates, on Wednesday, March 20. Hide Caption 24 of 29

Photos: What a shot! 29 amazing sports photos Kansas State Wildcats guard Cartier Diarra grabs the face of UC Irvine forward Elston Jones during their first-round game of the 2019 NCAA Men's Basketball Tournament in San Jose, California on Friday, March 22. Hide Caption 25 of 29

Photos: What a shot! 29 amazing sports photos Daieisho Hayato, left, throws Komusubi Hokutofuji to win his match on day 10 of the Grand Sumo Spring Tournament at Edion Arena Osaka in Osaka, Japan on Tuesday, March 19. Hide Caption 26 of 29

Photos: What a shot! 29 amazing sports photos A rider and her horse enter the track prior to the Grand Prix Hermes International Jumping Competition at the Grand Palais in Paris on Sunday, March 24. Hide Caption 27 of 29

Photos: What a shot! 29 amazing sports photos From left, Wofford Terriers teammates Chevez Goodwin, Tray Hollowell and Keve Aluma celebrate in the locker room after defeating the Seton Hall Pirates in the first round of the 2019 NCAA Men's Basketball Tournament in Jacksonville, Florida on Thursday, March 21. Hide Caption 28 of 29
